segments.text: I find myself simply observing the woman at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus on that plate is absolutely unwavering.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite surprising how absorbed she is in such a simple task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I mean, her entire environment is practically screaming for attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sound of the running water must be quite loud.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, she seems completely deaf to it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is so consistently neutral.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It almost makes me angry at her lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel the water splashing on her dress or seeping into her shoe?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry that if she turns suddenly, she might slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is definitely becoming dangerously slick.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's in her own little world of dish-drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This obliviousness is a core part of the scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It highlights the hidden dangers within ordinary life.
segments.speaker: PAR
